extensionDescription.message: Aggiunge un calendario che contiene i compleanni dei contatti presenti nelle rubriche.

defaultCalendarName.description: Nome predefinito per i calendari dei compleanni

addressBookSelection.message: Selezione delle rubriche di cui mostrare il calendario dei compleanni:
addressBookSelection.description: Label above the list of address books in the preferences

ageCalculationRangeSetting1.message: Calcolare l'intervallo di età entro cui operare:
ageCalculationRangeSetting1.description: Label for the setting controlling the range to generate age information for, rendered before the editable field.

ageCalculationRangeSetting2.description: Label for the setting controlling the range to generate age information for, rendered after the editable field.

ageCalculationRange.description: Text representing the range in which age calculation takes place, if longer than one year

ageCalculationRangeCurrentYear.description: Text representing the range in which age calculation takes place, if only a single year

ageCalculationRangeNone.description: Text representing the range in which age calculation takes place, if age calculation is disabled

ageCutoffYear1.message: Ignora gli anni di nascita fino a
ageCutoffYear1.description: Label for the latest birthyear to ignore when doing age calculations, rendered before the editable field.

ageCutoffYear2.description: Label for the latest birthyear to ignore when doing age calculations, rendered after the editable field.
